<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/assets/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate presigned URL for generic asset upload

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"slug","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Workspace slug","required":true,"examples":{"ExampleWorkspace":{"value":"my-workspace","summary":"Example workspace","description":"A typical workspace slug"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
